hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read -r fp; if echo "$fp" | grep -qE '(\.env$|\.env\.|poetry\.lock|Pipfile\.lock|\.git/)'; then echo "Blocked: protected file: $fp" >&2; exit 2; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read -r fp; if echo "$fp" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then black --quiet "$fp" 2>/dev/null; isort --quiet "$fp" 2>/dev/null; fi; }
jq -r '.stop_hook_active' | { read -r active; [ "$active" = "true" ] && exit 0; OUT=$("$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/scripts/verify.sh 2>&1); RC=$?; echo "$OUT" | tail -30 >&2; exit $RC; }
